ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 28
ygData.msgSnippet: The skill is capped at 200 if i remember correctly. Personally with the cost involved i d go for the cheaper combo of arrows. Also try to find an enchanter/wiz
ygData.messageBody:
The skill is capped at 200 if i remember correctly. Personally with the cost
involved i'd go for the cheaper combo of arrows. Also try to find an
enchanter/wiz buddy who could let you borrow some of that cool int gear so you
get skill checks better. that +10 int you may gain from their rings and such
would surely help you out a great deal.

Ranale of Povar Ranger of the 18th season. 102 skill (if i remember corectly. :)
